FuncDef: The display port vlan command displays information about interfaces in a VLAN. The display port vlan command displays information about interfaces in a VLAN.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Displays information about interfaces with specified types and numbers in successfully created VLANs.
-

ExtraInfo: To view information about interfaces in all VLANs configured on a device, run the display port vlan [ interface-type interface-number ] command. If you want to view information only about interfaces with specified types and numbers in successfully created VLANs, specify active in the preceding command. If a fault occurs on an interface, you can locate the fault based on the information about the interface and VLAN.
